roleset.name: to hit a home run
roleset.note: HOMER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'homer' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from homer.01-v predicate notes)
HOMER-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to homer.01-v. Framed by Katie (from homer.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: He was flawless afield ( ditto in game two ) , moved a runner along in the A 's three-run second inning , and homered for his team 's final tally .

example.name: the pitcher as source of ball
example.text: His two run homer off Ralph Branca
